title: John Ratcliffe

title: John Ratcliffe
deleted: As of October 13, 2021, the information Ratcliffe provided regarding the Russian Disinformation Hoax proved to be based off of authentic intelligence. Current indictments are beginning to shed light on the origins of the Russian Hoax.

title: John Ratcliffe
deleted: As of October 13, 2021, all of the above instances labeling anything "disinformation" or "baseless" or anything similar have been thoroughly debunked. The dossier was, indeed, a false plant funded by Hillary Clinton's team.
